mapper.select: select t.* from( select g.*,d.fileName from t_shopping_goods as g, t_goods_detail_image as d where g.goods_id=d.goods_id and d.filetype='main_image' and goods_status=#{goodsStatus} order by g.goods_entered_date desc) as t where rowNum() <16

select t_shopping_goods.*, t_goods_detail_image.fileName from t_shopping_goods, t_goods_detail_image where t_shopping_goods.goods_sort ='컴퓨터와인터넷' and t_goods_detail_image.filetype='main_image' and t_shopping_goods.goods_id = t_goods_detail_image.goods_id order by t_shopping_goods.goods_entered_date desc

select t_shopping_goods.*, t_goods_detail_image.fileName from t_shopping_goods , t_goods_detail_image where t_shopping_goods.goods_id=t_goods_detail_image.goods_id and t_goods_detail_image.filetype='main_image' and t_shopping_goods.goods_id=#{goods_id} order by t_shopping_goods.goods_id

select t_shopping_goods.*, t_goods_detail_image.fileName from t_shopping_goods, t_goods_detail_image where t_shopping_goods.goods_id=t_goods_detail_image.goods_id and t_goods_detail_image.filetype='main_image' and t_shopping_goods.goods_title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') order by t_shopping_goods.goods_entered_date desc
select goods_title from t_shopping_goods goods_title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by goods_entered_date desc
